pageTitle: NI HAO 你好~ I am Chinese. I created this group for people who are interested in learning Chinese, which is not so difficult as some people imagine. No language is difficult if you're REALLY keen to learn it, I believe. 同样欢迎中国朋友加入！ 你可以在这里结交新朋友，教其他成员汉语 (比如，帮助修改其他成员的汉语留言)。 Learning a new language should be fun. I hope you enjoy learning Chinese here with this wonderful group. :) Please feel free to ask questions and post comments on group topics.
